price: Na kabla yao kaumu ya Nuhu. Na hao hakika walikuwa ni madhaalimu zaidi, na waovu zaidi;
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ
footnotes: Na aliwaangamiza kaumu ya Nuhu kabla ya kuwaangamiza A'di na Thamudi. Hakika hao walikuwa wamekithiri kudhulumu, na wamezidi kwa uasi kuliko A'di na Thamudi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū hum aẓlama wa-aṭghā
